titles.title: To amend the Irrigation Project Contract Extension Act of 1998 to extend certain contracts between the Bureau of Reclamation and certain irrigation water contractors in the States of Wyoming and Nebraska.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Subcommittee on Water and Power Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-259.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 148.

action.text: Mr. Calvert moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2040.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 9/16/2003--Passed House without amendment. Amends the Irrigation Project Contract Extension Act of 1998 to provide for the extension of water service or repayment contracts for the Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project and the Cooperative Agreement for Platte River Research and other Efforts Relating to Endangered Species Habitats Along the Central Platte River, Nebraska, until December 31, 2005.
